department: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide work under this requirement comprise the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required for the servicing, repairs and installation of sewage lift station pumps and associated equipment at various areas of Halifax.
full_summary:
# Sewer Lift Station Pump Repair Tender
## Solicitation for Standing Offer

---

### Solicitation Overview

The Government of Canada is soliciting offers from qualified contractors to provide maintenance, repair, and installation services for sewer lift station pumps and associated equipment at various locations in Halifax.

### Solicitation Reference

* Solicitation Number: WS3865030174
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-02-15

### Tender Closing Date

Tender closing date is 2023-03-15 at 14:00 ET.

### Contract Duration

Contract Start Date: 2023-04-03.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to contractors who are eligible to participate under the following Free Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (C-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Separation

Tenders are sought for the repair and maintenance of sewer lift station pumps and associated equipment at various locations in the Halifax area.

### Contract Documents

Tender documents, including the solicitation notice, tender closing date, and contract duration, are available on the Ariba discovery website: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15431868?extsite=MTU0MzE4NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Contact Information

Contact Rosemary Trahan at [rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Territories of Operation

* Halifax
